title: Kapok Vegetarian Cafe
description: Chinese name 卡帛素食義式廚房 address 台北市大安區復興南路二段308巷5號. Italian style coffee cafe, egg-less bakery, and restaurant. Offers a set menu which comes with soup, jelly or bread, main course, and black tea. Or order a la carte. Offers afternoon tea from 2pm. Sources baked goods from its own bakery shop that's on Nanjing East Road (listed on HappyCow), which does not use any egg and offers some dairy-free cakes as well.
streetAddress: 5, Alley 308, Sec. 2, Fuxing South Road, Da-an District
